title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 601.8 - Withdrawal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 601.8 - Withdrawal

State Regulations
A local government may withdraw its approved LWRP at any time
as provided in the Executive Law. Withdrawal of an approved LWRP will effect an
immediate termination of all benefits accruing under the Executive Law, including but not limited to any funding or other technical assistance and the
effect of any local law or ordinance or portions thereof which required
approval of and were approved by the secretary pursuant to section
922
of the

Executive Law and Part 603 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
601.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
